params.text:
Expose pointers

Due to the fact that Viuact does not track types it does not know that a
function may return a pointer, and since it does not always know whether
a value refers to a pointer or not automatic dereference is not
reliable.

A Std.Pointer.deref function should be introduced to allow manual
pointer dereferencing. Maybe a Std.Pointer.take function would be
useful, but less safe.
